verbose_text: Taken together, our findings indicate that pre-treatment with IL-6 significantly abolishes the ability of hUC-MSCs to promote gastric epithelial cell proliferation and migration and provide new insight into the effects of the inflammatory cytokine, IL-6, on the tumor promoting ability of MSCs and its role in gastric cancer.
evidence: IL-6 significantly abolishes the ability of hUC-MSCs to promote gastric epithelial cell proliferation
